You can synchronize your phone with Windows media player to facilitate the transfer and management of media files

Transfer files or synchronize with Windows media player
To enable tethering on this device go to www.att.com/mywireless or dial 611.

This feature consumes battery power and increase your data usage. This service requires a subscription to the applicable modem plan. Please ensure you have subscribed to the appropriate data plan prior to use. Dial 1-877-872-2249 if you need assistance.
Set USB connection mode to \"Internet connection\"
Turn on \"Mobile Broadband Connect\" to start sharing internet connection with your PC

Unable to make calls while in Airplane mode.
Battery will deteriorate over time. Current condition is very good.

"In order to use On-Screen Phone, you must first install the ‘On-Screen Phone’ software onto your PC. On-Screen Phone allows you to remotely control your mobile device through your PC via USB, Bluetooth, or Wi-Fi connection."

International roaming charge will be applied while using roaming service (messaging and voice) from abroad.

"Data service can be used overseas if Data Roaming is enabled. However, using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.
Enable data roaming?"

"Data service can be used overseas if Data Roaming is enabled. However, using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.
Enable data roaming?"
Data roaming can be used. Please be advised that using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.

"Data roaming service has been basically blocked for overseas roaming since automatic update function for application, email and other services incur additional data roaming charges.

Press 'Allow' when you want data roaming.

※ Automatic update application:
Google account synchronization, Messenger, Game and etc"

string.b: You consent to the disclosure of the location of this handset from U.S. Cellular to third-party providers of location-based services by turning location \"ON\".

resources.string: The APN type cannot be set to entitlement
"It will incur additional charges if you are not using a flat rate pricing plan or you are using pay-services. Allow 3G/4G connection?"
"Data services will be limited when data connection is disallowed. Disallow 3G/4G connection?"
Require a PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. You can disable encryption by performing disabling storage encryption.
Only data created on storage after enabling storage encryption will be encrypted. Encrypted data cannot be read in other devices. By disabling storage will not be encrypted.
If you interrupt the process, you will lose some or all of your data."
"Failed to read data on SD card. Access to encrypted data is not allowed. Current PIN is required every time SD card is mounted. "
"Failed to read data on SD card. Access to encrypted data is not allowed. Current password is required every time SD card is mounted. "

"Eco mode extends battery life by dynamically optimizing CPU control policy.\\n\\n When Eco mode is turned off, Automatic mode is used to control the Quad cores to provide optimized system performance."

"If you fail to draw the correct pattern 5 times, press the button on the bottom of the screen, and the PIN code entry appears. Create a backup PIN code that is easy to remember (e.g.: Birthday, anniversary etc.)."

"After 5 failed pattern attempts you can use Google account to unlock phone. (You can reset the pattern lock at \"http://www.lgmobile.co.kr/\")
Ready to start? Touch Next."
WLAN is running. Try it later.
Change the Wi-Fi setting to \"OFF\", USB debugging to \"OFF\" and USB connection type setting to \"Charge only\".

Applications such as Email, Calendar, Contacts and Facebook(listed under Settings - Accounts & sync) are auto-synched using the mobile or Wi-Fi network. Turning off Auto-sync can extend battery life.

As other devices are connected to Wi-Fi hotspot through 3G/4G network on this device, it may incur data charges and battery may run out quickly. Apply this?
Activated Mobile Broadband Connect. To use Wi-Fi, Mobile Broadband Connect must be deactivated.
